SEARCH
Package com.myhrcrmproject.service

Class CommunicationService

java.lang.Object
com.myhrcrmproject.service.CommunicationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommonService<CommunicationRequestDTO,CommunicationResponseDTO>
@Service public class CommunicationService extends Object implements CommonService<CommunicationRequestDTO,CommunicationResponseDTO>
Service class that handles CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for communication entities.

This service provides methods to perform operations on communication entities, such as retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting communication records. It also includes additional methods for finding communication records based on different criteria.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Denys Chaykovskyy
